toncenter-http-api-v2.cdn-tonweb.mainnet:
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/orbs-network/ton-gateway@2.2.0/dist/index.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/toncenter/tonweb/dist/tonweb.js"></script>

<script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
        // get the decentralized RPC endpoint
        TonGateway.getHttpEndpoint().then((endpoint) => { 
            // initialize tonweb library
            const tonweb = new TonWeb(new TonWeb.HttpProvider(endpoint)); 
        });
    });
</script>
toncenter-http-api-v2.cdn-tonweb.testnet:
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/orbs-network/ton-gateway@2.2.0/dist/index.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/toncenter/tonweb/dist/tonweb.js"></script>

<script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
        // get the decentralized RPC endpoint
        TonGateway.getHttpEndpoint({ network: "testnet" }).then((endpoint) => { 
            // initialize tonweb library
            const tonweb = new TonWeb(new TonWeb.HttpProvider(endpoint)); 
        });
    });
</script>
